mapper.sql: id, created_at, updated_at, course_id, student_id, lesson_count, registered_at, end_at, expense, discount, refund, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into course_student
id,
created_at,
updated_at,
course_id,
student_id,
lesson_count,
registered_at,
end_at,
expense,
discount,
refund,
remark,

mapper.update:
update course_student
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lesson_count = #{lessonCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
registered_at = #{registeredAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expense = #{expense,jdbcType=INTEGER},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund = #{refund,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update course_student set created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lesson_count = #{lessonCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registered_at = #{registeredAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expense = #{expense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund = #{refund,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select registered_at as period, sum(expense) as income, sum(discount) as discount, sum(refund) as refund from course_student GROUP BY registered_at ORDER BY registered_at asc;
